vlive.korean: 드디어... 해방이다! Finally! I'm free! 듣기 View video 상사세끼 시즌2 : 전남친 마주치는 것보다 더 한 직장상사 마주쳤을 때 ㅣ [상사세끼2/상사삼끼2] 특별판
[지압 신발 해방] 형, 비아이는 못 사왔어요. 있었어요? [Free from massage slippers] B.I couldn't find one. Did you? 듣기 View video iKON : iKON - ‘자체제작 iKON TV’ EP.4-2

vlive.korean: 꽃들을 해방시켜 주는 거지 - 너 저 표정 안 하면 안 돼? I am liberating the flowers. - Can you not make that expression? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] All Night(전화해) M/V 리액션
vlive.english: I am liberating the flowers. - Can you not make that expression?

vlive.korean: 이게 약간 아프리카 여행 중에 정신적 해방감에 대해서 쓴 책이거든요. This book was written from his journey to Africa where he experienced mental liberation. 듣기 View video UNB : UNB DEBUT [BOYHOOD] VIDEO ART SHOW
vlive.english: This book was written from his journey to Africa where he experienced mental liberation.
